imdb.title: LoveSongWorld
synopsis: LoveSongWorld is a web-based international reality dating show with a unique twist in that contestants are chosen based on their singing voice. LoveSongWorld is filmed around the world including Los Angeles, San Francisco, Amsterdam and Berlin.At LoveSong, we have set out to explore different perceptions of love. Weve broken through cookie-cutter conventions to find that love isnt just about what you see, but more importantly about what you feel. Through our Internet media, musical instruments, games, television properties, books and other expressions of the brand, we remind people of what music is all about. We invite you to join us, as we discover new stories, songs and experiences that stir the most powerful of emotions; love.
